long_description: The comfortable, versatile and bounce-free Nathan Mercury 3 Hydration Belt is a great option for marathon training and longer road runs. Ergological(TM) neoprene and monofilament belt design offers soft, multidirectional stretch that eliminates bounce. Three 10 fl. oz. bottles with push-pull caps. Perforated neoprene at back for breathability and comfort. The Nathan Mercury 3 Hydration Belt features an iPhone-compatible stretch mesh zip pocket and reflective trim.
short_description: The comfortable, versatile and bounce-free Nathan Mercury 3 Hydration Belt is a great option for marathon training and longer road runs.
